meanings.definition: A type of protein found in corn.
meanings.sent1: The zeins in corn help provide nutrients for growth.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use zeins to feed their livestock.
meanings.sent3: The zeins in corn had a party with the vitamins and minerals.
meanings.sent4: Her body was a field of zeins, each one a building block of strength.
meanings.sent5: The zeins danced under the microscope, revealing their intricate structure.

meanings.sent1: She bought two bags of zeins from the store.
meanings.sent2: The zeins on the shelves were neatly organized.
meanings.sent3: The zeins gathered for a meeting to discuss their future plans.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with zeins, each one representing a different variety.
meanings.sent5: The zeins stood out in the crowd, each one unique in its own way.
